structural_units.address:
Nooruse 1
50411 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Introductional lectures of the research work.

objectives.en: To describe and analyse the most important and relevant experiences of the research work.
objectives.et: Kirjeldada ja analüüsida uurimistöö kõige tähtsamaid ja asjakohasemaid kogemusi.

learning_outcomes.en: The student that graduated the course:
- knows what is the research work;
- is able to forecast  possible results of research work;
learning_outcomes.et: - on võimeline prognoosima uurimistöö võimalikke tulemusi;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the different stages of research work;
- understand to find and evaluate information concerning above described stages;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab leida ja sisuliselt hinnata  löetletud  etappidesse puutuvat teavet;

learning_outcomes.en: - applies the obtained information to forming of research work.
